import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { RadioButton } from 'primereact/radiobutton'; function Answers() { const [answer, setAnswer] = useState(null); return (
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 0}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 1}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 2}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 3}/>
) } export default Answers
